data.name: TreeListBandPanelRowHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the band panel row height.

data.name: TreeListAppearancePrint
data.value: Provides access to the properties that specify the appearances of the Tree List's elements when the Tree List is printed and exported.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionVertLine
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the vertical lines.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionTreeLine
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the tree lines.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionSelectedRow
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the selected nodes.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionRow
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint data cells within Tree List nodes.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionPreview
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the preview section.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionOddRow
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint odd nodes.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionHorzLine
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the horizontal lines.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionHideSelectionRow
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the selected node(s) when the Tree List isn't focused.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionHeaderPanelBackground
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the column header panel's background.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionHeaderPanel
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the column header and node indicator panels.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionGroupFooter
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the group footer.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionGroupButton
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint node expand buttons.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionFooterPanel
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the summary footer.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionFocusedRow
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the currently focused node.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionFocusedCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the currently focused cell.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionFilterPanel
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the Filter Panel.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionEvenRow
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint even nodes.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionEmpty
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the Tree List's empty space.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionCaption
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the caption.

data.name: TreeListAppearanceCollectionBandPanel
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint band headers.

data.name: TreeListAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the Tree List's elements.

data.name: TreeListAfterFocusNode
data.value: Fires in response to focus being moved between nodes.

data.name: TreeListAfterExpand
data.value: Fires immediately after a node has been expanded.

data.name: TreeListAfterDropNode
data.value: Fires after a node is dropped.

data.name: TreeListAfterDragNode
data.value: Fires immediately after a drag-and-drop operation on a node has been successfully completed.

data.name: TreeListAfterCollapse
data.value: Fires immediately after a node has been collapsed.

data.name: TreeListAfterCheckNode
data.value: Occurs after a node's check state has been changed by an end-user.

data.name: OptionsLayoutTreeListStoreAppearance
data.value: Gets or sets whether the control's appearance settings are also stored when the layout is saved to storage, and restored when the layout is restored from storage.

data.name: OptionsLayoutTreeListRemoveOldColumns
data.value: Gets or sets whether the columns that exist in a layout when it's restored, but that don't exist in the current control, should be discarded or added to the control.

data.name: OptionsLayoutTreeListAddNewColumns
data.value: Gets or sets whether the columns that exist in the current control but do not exist in a layout when it's restored should be retained.

data.name: TreeListBeforeExpand
data.value: Fires before a node is expanded. Allows you to implement dynamic node loading in unbound mode.

data.name: TreeListBeforeDropNode
data.value: Fires before a node is dropped.

data.name: TreeListBeforeDragNode
data.value: Fires when an attempt to drag a node is performed.

data.name: TreeListBeforeCollapse
data.value: Fires before a node is collapsed.

data.name: TreeListBeforeCheckNode
data.value: Occurs before a node's check state is changed.

data.name: TreeListBandWidthChanged
data.value: Occurs when the band's width is changed.

data.name: TreeListBeforeFocusNode
data.value: Fires before a node is focused.

data.name: TreeListBeforeLoadLayout
data.value: Occurs before a layout is restored from storage (a stream, xml file or the system registry).

data.name: TreeListBestFitVisibleOnly
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying which nodes take part in calculations when applying best fit to columns.

data.name: TreeListBorderStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the border style for the Tree List.

data.name: TreeListCalcNodeDragImageIndex
data.value: Enables you to specify a custom image to be displayed in front of nodes when dragging.

data.name: TreeListCalcNodeHeight
data.value: Allows you to assign custom node height.

data.name: TreeListCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the caption displayed at the top of the TreeList control.

data.name: TreeListCaptionHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of the panel at the top of the TreeList control in which the caption is displayed.

data.name: TreeListCellValueChanged
data.value: Fires immediately after a cell editor is closed if the editor's value has been modified.

data.name: TreeListCellValueChanging
data.value: Fires when an end-user starts to edit a cell value.

data.name: TreeListColumnAllNodesSummary
data.value: Specifies whether a summary is calculated against all Tree List nodes or against root nodes only.

data.name: TreeListColumnAllowIncrementalSearch
data.value: Gets or sets whether incremental searches can be performed against the column.

data.name: TreeListColumnAppearanceCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the column's cells.

data.name: TreeListColumnAppearanceHeader
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the column header.

data.name: TreeListColumnButtonClick
data.value: Fires when the column button is clicked.

data.name: TreeListColumnCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the column caption displayed in the HeaderPanel of the XtraTreeList.

data.name: TreeListColumnChanged
data.value: Fires immediately after the column collection or an individual column has been modified.

data.name: TreeListColumnCollectionItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to individual columns.

data.name: TreeListColumnColumnEdit
data.value: Gets or sets the repository item that specifies the editor used to edit a column's cell values.

data.name: TreeListColumnCustomizationCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the column's caption when its header is displayed within the Customization Form.

data.name: TreeListColumnFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the field name assigned to the current column from a datasource.

data.name: TreeListColumnFilterChanged
data.value: Occurs when a column's filter condition is changed.

data.name: TreeListColumnFilterMode
data.value: Gets or sets how column values are filtered via the Auto Filter Row and Column's Filter DropDown.

data.name: TreeListColumnFormat
data.value: Gets the object that specifies the formatting applied to column values.

data.name: TreeListColumnImageAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the alignment of the column header's image.

data.name: TreeListColumnImageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed within the column header.

data.name: TreeListColumnMinWidth
data.value: Gets the minimum column width.

data.name: TreeListColumnOptionsColumn
data.value: Provides access to the column's options.

data.name: TreeListColumnOptionsFilter
data.value: Provides access to the column's filter options.

data.name: TreeListColumnPanelRowHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the height of the column header panel, in pixels.

data.name: TreeListColumnPositionChanged
data.value: Fires when a column is moved, hidden, or shown.

data.name: TreeListColumnRowFooterSummary
data.value: Specifies the type of the summary calculated against child nodes of every parent node in a column.

data.name: TreeListColumnRowFooterSummaryStrFormat
data.value: Gets or sets the format to display the TreeListColumn.RowFooterSummary.

data.name: TreeListColumnShowButtonMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying which column cells display editor buttons.

data.name: TreeListColumnShowUnboundExpressionMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can open an Expression Editor for the current unbound column, using a context menu.

data.name: TreeListColumnsImageList
data.value: Gets or sets the source of images that can be displayed within column headers.

data.name: TreeListColumnSortMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the column's data is sorted when sorting is applied.

data.name: TreeListColumnSortOrder
data.value: Gets or sets the column's sort order.

data.name: TreeListColumnSummaryFooter
data.value: Specifies the type of the summary to calculate against all nodes.

data.name: TreeListColumnSummaryFooterStrFormat
data.value: Gets or sets the format to display the TreeListColumn.SummaryFooter.

data.name: TreeListColumnTag
data.value: Gets or sets the column's associated data.

data.name: TreeListColumnToolTip
data.value: Gets or sets a custom tooltip for the column.

data.name: TreeListColumnUnboundExpression
data.value: Gets or sets an expression used to evaluate values for the current unbound column.

data.name: TreeListColumnUnboundExpressionChanged
data.value: Fires after a column's TreeListColumn.UnboundExpression property has been changed.

data.name: TreeListColumnUnboundType
data.value: Gets or sets the data type and binding mode of the column.

data.name: TreeListColumnVisibleIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the position in the Tree List where the current column is displayed.

data.name: TreeListColumnWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the column width in pixels.

data.name: TreeListColumnWidthChanged
data.value: Fires after a column's width has been changed.

data.name: TreeListCompareNodeValues
data.value: Enables you to implement custom sorting for columns whose TreeListColumn.SortMode property is set to Custom.

data.name: TreeListCreateCustomNode
data.value: Provides the ability to create custom nodes.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawBandHeader
data.value: Provides the capability to custom paint band headers.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawColumnHeader
data.value: Provides the ability to custom paint column headers and the column button.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawEmptyArea
data.value: Enables you to custom paint a Tree List's empty area.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawFilterPanel
data.value: Enables you to custom paint the Filter Panel.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawFooter
data.value: Gives you the ability to perform custom painting of the summary footer.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawFooterCell
data.value: Gives you the ability to perform custom painting of column footer cells.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawNodeButton
data.value: Gives you the ability to perform custom painting of expand buttons.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawNodeCell
data.value: Provides the ability to perform custom painting of node cells.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawNodeCheckBox
data.value: Enables you to manually paint check boxes displayed within nodes.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawNodeImages
data.value: Provides the ability to perform custom painting of node state and select images.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawNodeIndent
data.value: Enables tree indents to be painted manually.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawNodeIndicator
data.value: Provides the ability to perform custom painting of indicator cells.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawNodePreview
data.value: Provides the ability to perform custom painting of preview sections.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawRowFooter
data.value: Provides the ability to perform custom painting of row footers.

data.name: TreeListCustomDrawRowFooterCell
data.value: Provides the ability to perform custom painting of row footer cells.

data.name: TreeListCustomFilterDisplayText
data.value: Allows the text displayed within the Filter Panel to be customized.

data.name: TreeListCustomNodeCellEdit
data.value: Enables editors to be assigned to cells on an individual basis.

data.name: TreeListCustomNodeCellEditForEditing
data.value: Allows you to assign a custom editor to a column for in-place editing and override the default column editor, which is by default used both in display and edit modes.

data.name: TreeListCustomUnboundColumnData
data.value: Enables data to be provided to, and modified data to be saved from visible unbound columns.

data.name: TreeListDataMember
data.value: Gets or sets a specific list in a data source whose data is displayed by the TreeList control.

data.name: TreeListDataSource
data.value: Gets or sets the object used as the data source for the current TreeList control.

data.name: TreeListDefaultPaintHelperChanged
data.value: Fires when a different paint helper is assigned to the TreeList control.

data.name: TreeListDragCancelNode
data.value: Fires immediately after a drag-and-drop operation over a node has been cancelled.

data.name: TreeListDragObjectDrop
data.value: Fires immediately after the drag and drop operation has been completed.

data.name: TreeListDragObjectOver
data.value: Enables you to control whether the dragged column header can be dropped at the current position.

data.name: TreeListDragObjectStart
data.value: Fires when an end-user attempts to drag a column header.

data.name: TreeListEndSorting
data.value: Fires after a sorting operation has finished.

data.name: TreeListFilterEditorCreated
data.value: Allows you to customize the Filter Editor before it is displayed on screen.

data.name: TreeListFilterNode
data.value: Enables you to hide particular nodes.

data.name: TreeListFocusedColumnChanged
data.value: Fires immediately after focus has been moved from a column.

data.name: TreeListFocusedNodeChanged
data.value: Fires immediately after changing the focused node.

data.name: TreeListFooterPanelHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the height of the Summary Footer.

data.name: TreeListGetCustomSummaryValue
data.value: Enables you to perform custom summary value calculations.

data.name: TreeListGetNodeDisplayValue
data.value: Provides the ability to display custom values within cells.

data.name: TreeListGetPreviewText
data.value: Enables you to supply custom preview text for each node.

data.name: TreeListGetPrintCustomSummaryValue
data.value: Permits manual calculations of summary values for the printed version of the Tree List control.

data.name: TreeListGetPrintPreviewText
data.value: Enables you to display custom text within preview sections of the printed control.

data.name: TreeListGetSelectImage
data.value: Allows you to dynamically assign select images to nodes.

data.name: TreeListGetStateImage
data.value: Allows you to assign state images to nodes.

data.name: TreeListHiddenEditor
data.value: Fires immediately after a cell editor has been closed.

data.name: TreeListHideCustomizationForm
data.value: Fires immediately after the Customization Form has been closed.

data.name: TreeListHorzScrollStep
data.value: Gets or sets the offset by which the Tree List is scrolled horizontally when the scrollbar buttons are clicked.

data.name: TreeListHorzScrollVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying when the horizontal scrollbar should be displayed.

data.name: TreeListHtmlImages
data.value: Gets or sets a collection of images to be inserted into column headers using HTML tags.

data.name: TreeListImageIndexFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the field whose values represent select image indexes for corresponding nodes.

data.name: TreeListIndicatorWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the node indicator's width.

data.name: TreeListInvalidNodeException
data.value: Fires when a node fails validation or when its data cannot be saved to the data source.

data.name: TreeListInvalidValueException
data.value: Enables you to handle exceptions raised as a result of assigning invalid values to cells.

data.name: TreeListKeyFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the key field of the data source bound to the Tree List control.

data.name: TreeListLayoutUpdated
data.value: Fires after a Tree List's layout has been changed.

data.name: TreeListLayoutUpgrade
data.value: Occurs after a layout the version of which doesn't match the current layout version used has been loaded from storage (a stream, xml file or system registry).

data.name: TreeListLeftCoordChanged
data.value: Fires when the control's content is scrolled horizontally.

data.name: TreeListLoad
data.value: Occurs when a TreeList control is displayed for the first time.

data.name: TreeListLookAndFeel
data.value: Provides access to settings which control the Tree List's look and feel.

data.name: TreeListMeasurePreviewHeight
data.value: Allows you to specify the height of individual preview sections in pixels.

data.name: TreeListMinWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of all the columns in a Tree List.

data.name: TreeListMultiSelectionItem
data.value: Gets a TreeListNode object from the collection of selected nodes referenced by the specified index.

data.name: TreeListNodeCellStyle
data.value: Enables appearances to be assigned to individual cells.

data.name: TreeListNodeChanged
data.value: Fires after the node's property has changed.

data.name: TreeListNodeCheckState
data.value: Gets or sets the node's check state.

data.name: TreeListNodeExpanded
data.value: Specifies whether the current node is expanded.

data.name: TreeListNodeFirstNode
data.value: Gets the first child node.

data.name: TreeListNodeFocused
data.value: Gets whether the node is currently focused.

data.name: TreeListNodeHasChildren
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a node has children.

data.name: TreeListNodeId
data.value: Gets the index of the corresponding record within the associated data source.

data.name: TreeListNodeImageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the node's select image displayed when this node is not focused.

data.name: TreeListNodeItem
data.value: Gets or sets a value for a specific column.

data.name: TreeListNodeLastNode
data.value: Gets the last child node.

data.name: TreeListNodeLevel
data.value: Returns the nesting level of a node.

data.name: TreeListNodeNextNode
data.value: Returns the next node in the collection.

data.name: TreeListNodeNextVisibleNode
data.value: Returns the next visible node after the current node.

data.name: TreeListNodeNodes
data.value: Gets the collection of the node's children.

data.name: TreeListNodeParentNode
data.value: Gets the parent node of the current tree node.

data.name: TreeListNodePrevNode
data.value: Gets the previous node in the collection.

data.name: TreeListNodePrevVisibleNode
data.value: Returns the visible node located prior to the current node.

data.name: TreeListNodeRootNode
data.value: Gets a node at the root level which contains the current node as a child.

data.name: TreeListNodes
data.value: Provides access to the collection of the TreeList's root nodes.

data.name: TreeListNodesAutoFilterNode
data.value: Gets the Auto Filter Row element.

data.name: TreeListNodesCount
data.value: Gets the number of nodes in the current node collection, without taking into account children of these nodes.

data.name: TreeListNodeSelected
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current node is selected.

data.name: TreeListNodeSelectImageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the node's select image displayed when the node is focused.

data.name: TreeListNodesFirstNode
data.value: Gets the first element in the collection.

data.name: TreeListNodesIsSynchronized
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether access to the nodes collection is synchronized (thread-safe).

data.name: TreeListNodesItem
data.value: Obtains the TreeListNode object by a specific index in the current node collection.

data.name: TreeListNodesLastNode
data.value: Gets the last node in the node collection.

data.name: TreeListNodesParentNode
data.value: Gets the parent of the node collection.

data.name: TreeListNodesReloaded
data.value: Fires when the Tree List control reloads all nodes.

data.name: TreeListNodesSyncRoot
data.value: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the nodes collection.

data.name: TreeListNodeStateImageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the node's state image from the TreeList.StateImageList.

data.name: TreeListNodesTreeList
data.value: Gets the TreeList object to which the node collection belongs.

data.name: TreeListNodeTag
data.value: Gets or sets the data associated with a Tree List node.

data.name: TreeListNodeTreeList
data.value: Gets the TreeList object to which the current node belongs.

data.name: TreeListNodeVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the node is visible.

data.name: TreeListOperationNeedsFullIteration
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether all or only parent nodes must be processed by the operation.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBandFixedWidth
data.value: Specifies whether the band's width remains fixed when the TreeList's auto width feature is enabled and the Tree List is resized.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBandShowInCustomizationForm
data.value: Specifies whether the band's header is displayed in the Customization Form when the band is hidden.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehavior
data.value: Provides access to the Tree List's behavior options.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorAllowExpandOnDblClick
data.value: Gets or sets whether a node is expanded/collapsed after it has been double clicked.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorAllowIncrementalSearch
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can locate nodes by typing the desired column value.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorAllowIndeterminateCheckState
data.value: Gets or sets whether a node can be set to the indeterminate check state.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorAllowPixelScrolling
data.value: Gets or sets whether smooth pixel-based vertical scrolling is enabled for nodes.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorAllowRecursiveNodeChecking
data.value: Gets or sets whether child nodes are automatically checked/unchecked when a parent node is checked/unchecked and vice versa.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorAutoChangeParent
data.value: Gets or sets whether the node's parent field value is automatically set to the key field value of its parent node.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorAutoNodeHeight
data.value: Gets or sets whether the height of each node is automatically adjusted to completely display the contents of its cells.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorAutoPopulateColumns
data.value: Gets or sets whether columns should be automatically created for all the fields in the underlying data source when the Tree List doesn't contain any columns.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorAutoSelectAllInEditor
data.value: Gets or sets whether activating a cell editor using the mouse or ENTER or F2 keys selects the entire editor's content.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorCloseEditorOnLostFocus
data.value: Gets or sets whether the active editor is automatically closed when the Tree List loses focus.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorEditable
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to invoke cell editors.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorEnableFiltering
data.value: Gets or sets a value which specifies whether nodes can be filtered.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorExpandNodesOnIncrementalSearch
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether collapsed nodes are expanded to display the node if it matches the search criteria.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorImmediateEditor
data.value: Gets or sets whether an in-place editor is automatically activated when a cell is clicked.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorKeepSelectedOnClick
data.value: Gets or sets whether the selected nodes remain selected when their values are being edited.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorPopulateServiceColumns
data.value: Gets or sets whether the PopulateColumns method creates columns that are bound to the fields specified by the TreeList.KeyFieldName, TreeList.ParentFieldName and TreeList.ImageIndexFieldName properties.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorResizeNodes
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to change the heights of nodes.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorShowEditorOnMouseUp
data.value: Gets or sets whether a cell's editor is activated when the mouse button is released from a click within the cell.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorShowToolTips
data.value: Gets or sets whether tooltips are displayed for the cells and column headers.

data.name: TreeListOptionsBehaviorSmartMouseHover
data.value: Gets or sets whether the regions occupied by the scroll bars and active cell editors are considered to be a part of the Tree List's area.

data.name: TreeListOptionsClipboard
data.value: Provides access to the clipboard options.

data.name: TreeListOptionsClipboardAllowCopy
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can copy selected TreeList nodes to the clipboard.

data.name: TreeListOptionsClipboardCopyNodeHierarchy
data.value: Specifies whether the nodes hierarchy should be saved.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnAllowEdit
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can invoke editors for the column's cells.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnAllowFocus
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can move focus to the column using either the mouse or keyboard.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnAllowMove
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can drag the column's header.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnAllowMoveToCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can drag the column's header to the Customization Form.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnAllowSize
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can drag the column header's right edge to change the column's width.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnAllowSort
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can sort data by the column's values.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnFilterAllowAutoFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's values can be filtered using the Auto Filter Row.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnFilterAllowFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can filter against the current column using the filter dropdown.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnFilterAutoFilterCondition
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the comparison operator used to create filter conditions for the current column via the auto filter row.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnFilterFilterPopupMode
data.value: Gets or sets the display mode for the current column's filter dropdown.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnFilterImmediateUpdateAutoFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's filter condition is updated as soon as an end-user modifies the contents of the auto filter row's cell.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnFilterShowEmptyDateFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether a Filter DropDown has a filter used to select records that contain null values in a date-time column.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnFixedWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's width remains the same when the column's auto width feature is enabled.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnPrintable
data.value: Gets or sets whether a column is included in the print/export output.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnReadOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are prevented from editing the column's cell values.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnShowInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's header is displayed within the Customization Form when the column is hidden.

data.name: TreeListOptionsColumnShowInExpressionEditor
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current column is available in the field list in the Expression Editor.

data.name: TreeListOptionsCustomization
data.value: Provides access to a TreeList's customization options.

data.name: TreeListOptionsCustomizationAllowBandMoving
data.value: Specifies whether bands can be moved by dragging their headers.

data.name: TreeListOptionsCustomizationAllowBandResizing
data.value: Specifies whether bands can be resized by dragging the right edge of their headers.

data.name: TreeListOptionsCustomizationAllowChangeBandParent
data.value: Specifies whether bands can be moved between parents.

data.name: TreeListOptionsCustomizationAllowChangeColumnParent
data.value: Specifies whether columns can be moved between bands.

data.name: TreeListOptionsCustomizationAllowColumnMoving
data.value: Specifies whether columns can be moved by dragging their headers.

data.name: TreeListOptionsCustomizationAllowColumnResizing
data.value: Specifies whether columns can be resized by dragging the right edge of their headers.

data.name: TreeListOptionsCustomizationAllowQuickHideColumns
data.value: Specifies whether bands and individual columns can be hidden by dragging their headers away from the header panel.

data.name: TreeListOptionsCustomizationShowBandsInCustomizationForm
data.value: Specifies whether hidden bands are displayed in the Customization Form.

data.name: TreeListOptionsDragAndDrop
data.value: Contains options that control the node drag-and-drop functionality.

data.name: TreeListOptionsDragAndDropAcceptOuterNodes
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current TreeList accepts nodes being dragged from another TreeList control.

data.name: TreeListOptionsDragAndDropCanCloneNodesOnDrop
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to clone nodes using drag-and-drop.

data.name: TreeListOptionsDragAndDropDragNodesExpandDelay
data.value: Gets or sets the amount of time (in milliseconds) before the node is expanded when another node is dragged over it.

data.name: TreeListOptionsDragAndDropDragNodesMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether single or multiple nodes can be dragged simultaneously, or whether the drag-and-drop functionality is disabled.

data.name: TreeListOptionsDragAndDropDropNodesMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether the SHIFT key needs to be pressed to insert a node before another node.

data.name: TreeListOptionsDragAndDropExpandNodeOnDrag
data.value: Gets or sets whether collapsed nodes are automatically expanded when the node currently being dragged is hovered over them.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFilter
data.value: Provides access to the TreeList's filtering options.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFind
data.value: Provides access to settings controlling the behavior and visibility of the current TreeList's Find Panel and its elements.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFindAllowFindPanel
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Find Panel can be invoked by an end-user.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFindAlwaysVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Find Panel is always visible.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFindClearFindOnClose
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Find Panel's search (filter) string is cleared when the Find Panel is hidden.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFindFindDelay
data.value: Gets or sets the delay in milliseconds, after which a data search is initiated (if automatic search mode is active).

data.name: TreeListOptionsFindFindFilterColumns
data.value: Gets or sets the field names against which searches are performed by the Find Panel.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFindFindMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether data searches start automatically, or must be started manually.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFindFindNullPrompt
data.value: Gets or sets the text displayed grayed out when the search box is empty.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFindHighlightFindResults
data.value: Gets or sets whether the search string is highlighted within located records.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFindShowClearButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Clear button is displayed within the Find Panel.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFindShowCloseButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the close ('x') button is displayed within the Find Panel.

data.name: TreeListOptionsFindShowFindButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Find button is displayed within the Find Panel.

data.name: TreeListOptionsLayout
data.value: Provides access to options that specify how a control's layout is stored to and restored from a data store (a stream, xml file or the system registry).

data.name: TreeListOptionsMenu
data.value: Provides access to the Tree List's menu options.

data.name: TreeListOptionsMenuEnableColumnMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can invoke the column header context menu.

data.name: TreeListOptionsMenuEnableFooterMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can invoke footer context menus.

data.name: TreeListOptionsMenuShowAutoFilterRowItem
data.value: Gets whether the 'Show Auto Filter Row' check item is displayed within the Column Header Context Menu.

data.name: TreeListOptionsMenuShowConditionalFormattingItem
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Conditional Formatting menu is available in a column's context menu at runtime, allowing end-users to apply style formats to columns.

data.name: TreeListOptionsNavigation
data.value: Provides access to a TreeList's focus navigation options.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrint
data.value: Provides access to the Tree List's options that affect how the control is printed and exported

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintAllowCancelPrintExport
data.value: Gets or sets whether the print/export progress window contains the Cancel button, which allows an end-user to cancel the current print/export operation.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintAutoRowHeight
data.value: Gets or sets whether the height of nodes is calculated automatically when the Tree List is printed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintAutoWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether columns are automatically stretched when the Tree List is printed so that it fits the page's width (except margins).

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintAllNodes
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Tree List is printed with all its nodes expanded.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintBandHeader
data.value: Gets or sets whether band headers are printed/exported.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintFilledTreeIndent
data.value: Gets or sets whether the tree indents are painted using the appearance settings of their corresponding nodes when the Tree List is printed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintHorzLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether horizontal lines are printed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintImages
data.value: Gets or sets whether the state and select images are printed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintPageHeader
data.value: Gets or sets whether column headers are printed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintPreview
data.value: Gets or sets whether preview sections are printed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintReportFooter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the summary footer is printed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintRowFooterSummary
data.value: Gets or sets whether group footers are printed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintTree
data.value: Gets or sets whether the tree lines are printed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintTreeButtons
data.value: Gets or sets whether the node expand buttons are printed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintPrintVertLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether vertical lines are printed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintShowPrintExportProgress
data.value: Gets or sets whether a separate window is used to indicate print/export progress.

data.name: TreeListOptionsPrintUsePrintStyles
data.value: Gets or sets whether the print appearances are used when the Tree List is printed and exported.

data.name: TreeListOptionsSelection
data.value: Provides access to the Tree List's selection options.

data.name: TreeListOptionsSelectionEnableAppearanceFocusedCell
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings for the focused cell are enabled.

data.name: TreeListOptionsSelectionEnableAppearanceFocusedRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings for the focused node are enabled.

data.name: TreeListOptionsSelectionInvertSelection
data.value: Gets or sets whether the focused style is applied to the focused cell only or to all the cells except for the focused one.

data.name: TreeListOptionsSelectionMultiSelect
data.value: Gets or sets whether multiple nodes can be selected.

data.name: TreeListOptionsSelectionMultiSelectMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether multiple selection is made by node or by cell.

data.name: TreeListOptionsSelectionUseIndicatorForSelection
data.value: Gets or sets whether nodes can be selected via the node indicator when the Tree List is in multiple selection mode.

data.name: TreeListOptionsView
data.value: Provides access to the Tree List's display options.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether column and node icons of the current TreeList should be painted with the foreground color of these columns or nodes.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewAllowHtmlDrawHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether HTML formatting can be applied to column and band captions.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewAutoCalcPreviewLineCount
data.value: Gets or sets whether the number of text lines within preview sections are calculated automatically depending upon their contents.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewAutoWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether the widths of column is automatically adjusted so that the total width of all the columns matches the Tree List's width.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewEnableAppearanceEvenRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether even nodes are painted using the appearance settings provided by the TreeListAppearanceCollection.EvenRow property.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewEnableAppearanceOddRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether odd nodes are painted using the appearance settings provided by the TreeListAppearanceCollection.OddRow property.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewExpandButtonCentered
data.value: Gets or sets whether the expand button is vertically centered within the node.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewFocusRectStyle
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the focus rectangle is painted.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewHeaderFilterButtonShowMode
data.value: Gets or sets the display style of column filter buttons.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowAutoFilterRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Auto Filter Row is displayed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowButtons
data.value: Gets or sets whether the expand buttons are displayed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowCaption
data.value: Gets or sets whether the caption panel is displayed at the top of the TreeList control.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowColumns
data.value: Gets or sets whether column headers are displayed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowFilterPanelMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies when the Filter Panel is shown.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowHorzLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether horizontal lines are displayed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowIndentAsRowStyle
data.value: Gets or sets whether tree indents are painted using the appearance settings of their corresponding nodes.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowIndicator
data.value: Gets or sets whether the node indicator panel is displayed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowPreview
data.value: Gets or sets whether preview sections are displayed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowRoot
data.value: Gets or sets whether tree lines between root nodes are displayed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowRowFooterSummary
data.value: Gets or sets whether group footers are displayed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowSummaryFooter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the summary footer is displayed.

data.name: TreeListOptionsViewShowVertLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether vertical lines are displayed.

data.name: TreeListParentFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets a value representing the data source field identifying the parent record in this data source.

data.name: TreeListPopupMenuShowing
data.value: Allows you to customize the default menus for column headers, summary footers and nodes.

data.name: TreeListPreviewFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the field whose values are displayed in preview sections.

data.name: TreeListPreviewLineCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of text lines within preview sections.

data.name: TreeListPrintAppearanceCollectionBandPanel
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the band headers when the TreeList is printed.

data.name: TreeListPrintAppearanceCollectionCaption
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the caption when the Tree List is printed.

data.name: TreeListPrintAppearanceCollectionEvenRow
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the even nodes when the Tree List is printed.

data.name: TreeListPrintAppearanceCollectionFooterPanel
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the summary footer when the Tree List is printed.

data.name: TreeListPrintAppearanceCollectionGroupFooter
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the group footer when the Tree List is printed.

data.name: TreeListPrintAppearanceCollectionHeaderPanel
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the column headers when the Tree List is printed.

data.name: TreeListPrintAppearanceCollectionLines
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the horizontal and vertical lines when the Tree List is printed.

data.name: TreeListPrintAppearanceCollectionOddRow
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the odd nodes when the Tree List is printed.

data.name: TreeListPrintAppearanceCollectionPreview
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the preview sections when the Tree List is printed.

data.name: TreeListPrintAppearanceCollectionRow
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the data cells when the Tree List is printed.

data.name: TreeListPrintExportProgress
data.value: Fires repeatedly while the TreeList's data is being printed/exported.

data.name: TreeListRootValue
data.value: Gets or sets the value used to identify the records in the underlying data source that will be represented as root nodes. These records must have the RootValue in the field specified by the TreeList.ParentFieldName property.

data.name: TreeListRowHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the height of a node in pixels.

data.name: TreeListSelectImageClick
data.value: Fires when the user clicks a node's select image.

data.name: TreeListSelectImageList
data.value: Gets or sets the source of select images for nodes.

data.name: TreeListSelectionChanged
data.value: Fires in response to changing selection when the TreeList is in multiselect mode.

data.name: TreeListShowButtonMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value determining the manner in which the editor buttons of TreeList cells are displayed.

data.name: TreeListShowCustomizationForm
data.value: Fires immediately after the Customization Form has been displayed.

data.name: TreeListShowFilterPopupCheckedListBox
data.value: Allows you to customize checked Column's Filter DropDown lists before they are displayed.

data.name: TreeListShowFilterPopupDate
data.value: Allows you to customize a column's dropdown calendar before it is displayed.

data.name: TreeListShowFilterPopupListBox
data.value: Enables you to customize a particular Column's Filter DropDown.

data.name: TreeListShowingEditor
data.value: Fires before the TreeList is switched to edit mode.

data.name: TreeListShownEditor
data.value: Fires immediately after a cell editor has been invoked.

data.name: TreeListShowTreeListMenu
data.value: Allows you to customize the default menus for column headers, summary footers and nodes.

data.name: TreeListStartSorting
data.value: Fires before a sorting operation is started.

data.name: TreeListStateChanged
data.value: Fires after the Tree List's state has changed.

data.name: TreeListStateImageClick
data.value: Fires when the user clicks a node's state image.

data.name: TreeListStateImageList
data.value: Gets or sets the source of state images for nodes.

data.name: TreeListTopVisibleNodeIndexChanged
data.value: Fires when the control's content is scrolled vertically.

data.name: TreeListTreeLevelWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of the level's indent space.

data.name: TreeListTreeLineStyle
data.value: Specifies the style for displaying tree lines of the current TreeList control.

data.name: TreeListTreeListMenuItemClick
data.value: Provides the ability to perform custom handling of a context menu item click.

data.name: TreeListUnboundExpressionEditorCreated
data.value: Fires after an Expression Editor has been created for an unbound column.

data.name: TreeListUseDisabledStatePainter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the control is painted grayed out, when it's in the disabled state.

data.name: TreeListValidateNode
data.value: Gives you the ability to specify whether a modified node's data is valid, and if this node can lose focus.

data.name: TreeListValidatingEditor
data.value: Fires when an editor is validated.

data.name: TreeListVertScrollVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying when the Tree List's vertical scrollbar is visible.

data.name: TreeListVirtualTreeGetCellValue
data.value: This event allows you to initialize cells of the processed node, when populating the Tree List control with data dynamically.

data.name: TreeListVirtualTreeGetChildNodes
data.value: This event allows you to provide root and child nodes, when populating the Tree List control with data dynamically.

data.name: TreeListVirtualTreeSetCellValue
data.value: Allows changes that are made via the TreeListControl's cells to be stored.

data.name: TreeListVisibleNodeOperationNeedsFullIteration
data.value: Returns a value that specifies whether all nodes or only those that have children are to be visited.
